function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High reduction in airplane seats and passenger traffic due to covid-19 impact","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 outbreak on aviation industry, leading to reduced annual rpks and revenues","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reductions in air pollution due to covid-19-induced lockdowns and decreased industrial activities.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The high level of air pollution is linked to the spread and impact of respiratory diseases, coronary heart diseases, lung cancer, and asthma, making people more susceptible to the damaging effects of contagious diseases such as coronavirus.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Between 28,000 to 36,000 deaths per year in the uk are linked to long-term exposure to air pollutants, further increasing the impact of air pollution on public health and wellbeing.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in environmental noise over the lockdown period has been reported to have saved more lives than those already caused by covid-19 in china, indicating the significant impact of environmental factors on public health.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Environmental noise pollution impacting health and well-being","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on coal and oil demand","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in global electricity demand during lockdown","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented reduction in global co2
